sentences.en: The team were greeted by thousands of jubilant supporters.
sentences.cn: 该队受到了上千名欢欣鼓舞的支持者的欢迎。

sentences.en: Hundreds of thousands of jubilant Americans cheered him on his return.
sentences.cn: 成千上万欢腾的美国人为他的归来而欢呼。

sentences.en: Although Tom's ear tingled, his heart was jubilant.
sentences.cn: 虽然汤姆的耳朵有点刺痛，但他的心却很高兴。
